mapper.select:
select (select `value` from sys_dict where sys_dict.code='1002' and sys_dict.`key`=i.`fplx`) as fplx, i.`FPTQM` as fptqm, i.`FPLSH` as fplsh, i.`FPDM` as fpdm, i.`FPHM` as fphm, DATE_FORMAT(i.`KPSJ`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as kpsj, i.`QYBH` as qybh, i.`POS_id` as posId, i.`GFMC` as gfmc, i.`GFSH` as gfsh, i.`GFYHZH` as gfyhzh, i.`GFDZDH` as gfdzdh, i.`PDFXZDZ` as pdfxzdz, i.`HJJE` as hjje, i.HJSE as hjse, i.`KPR` as kpr, i.`FHR` as fhr, i.`SJH` as sjh, i.`SKR` as skr, a.`XFMC` as xfmc, a.`XFSH` as xfsh, a.`XFYHZH` as xfyhzh, a.`XFDZDH` as xfdzdh, a.`EMAIL` as email, (select value from sys_dict where sys_dict.code=1003 and sys_dict.`key`=a.`djzt`) as djzt from i_inv i left join i_billmain a on i.`FPLSH` = a.`FPLSH`
where 1=1
and i.FPTQM like concat(concat('%',#{fptqm}),'%')
and i.FPLSH like concat(concat('%',#{fplsh}),'%')
and i.GFMC like concat(concat('%',#{gfmc}),'%')
and i.GFSH like concat(concat('%',#{gfsh}),'%')
and str_to_date(i.`kpsj`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{starttime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(i.`kpsj`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and a.DJZT = #{djzt}
ORDER BY i.fplx limit #{p.offset}, #{p.size}

select T1.id,T1.QYBH, T1.FPTQM, T1.FPLSH, T1.DJZT, (SELECT VALUE FROM SYS_DICT T2 WHERE T2.CODE='1003' AND T2.KEY =T1.DJZT ) DJZTNAME, (SELECT VALUE FROM SYS_DICT T2 WHERE T2.CODE='1009' AND T2.KEY =T1.DJLX ) DJLXNAME, T1.DJLX,T1.DJLY, T1.NSRSBH, T1.FJH, T1.KPZDH, T1.FPZL, T1.KPLX, T1.XFSH, T1.XFMC,T1.XFDZDH, T1.XFYHZH, T1.GFSH, T1.GFMC, T1.GFDZDH, T1.GFYHZH, T1.KPR, T1.SKR, T1.FHR, T1.YFPDM, T1.YFPHM, T1.HPTZDBH, T1.QDBZ, T1.JSHJ, T1.HJJE, T1.HJSE, T1.BMBBH, T1.BZ, T1.SJ, T1.EMAIL, T1.JFZT, T1.CZSJ, i.KPSJ from i_billmain T1 left join i_inv i i
and T1.DJZT =#{djzt}
and T1.fptqm like concat('%',replace(replace(#{fptqm}, '_', '\_'),'%', '\%'), '%')
and T1.fplsh like concat('%',replace(replace(#{fplsh}, '_', '\_'),'%', '\%'), '%')
and T1.gfmc like concat('%',replace(replace(#{gfmc}, '_', '\_'),'%', '\%'), '%')
and T1.gfsh like concat('%',replace(replace(#{gfsh}, '_', '\_'),'%', '\%'), '%')
and str_to_date(i.kpsj,'%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{starttime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(i.kpsj,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by i.POS_id desc
